Package: grails.mongodb.bootstrap

[Groovy] Class MongoDbDataStoreSpringInitializer

      • grails.mongodb.bootstrap.MongoDbDataStoreSpringInitializer

      • Used to initialize GORM for MongoDB outside of Grails

        Authors:
        Graeme Rocher
        Since:
        2.0
